mapper.select: select ci.classcode,ci.class_name,cti.class_starttime,cti.class_endtime,cti.class_date from class_information as ci , class_time_information as cti where ci.classcode in (select cti0.class_information_classcode from class_time_information as cti0 where cti0.class_timecode in (select cr0.class_time_information_class_timecode from class_room as cr0 where cr0.member_usercode = #{id})) order by class_date;

select ci.classcode,ci.class_name,cti.class_starttime,cti.class_endtime,cti.class_date from class_information as ci , class_time_information as cti where date(cti.class_date) >= date(subdate(now(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)) AND date(cti.class_date)>= date(now()) AND ci.classcode in (select cti0.class_information_classcode from class_time_information as cti0 where cti0.class_timecode in (select cr0.class_time_information_class_timecode from class_room as cr0 where cr0.member_usercode = #{id}));
mapper.insert: insert into member(usercode, nickname, address, address_detail, lat, lng, dong, usertype) values(#{usercode}, #{nickname}, #{address}, #{address_detail}, #{lat}, #{lng}, #{dong}, #{usertype})
